00039                            const char * theDesc,
00040                            RooRealVar & dt) {
00041 //
00042 // Constructor

00053 void BdkPdf2Gauss::init(const char * theName,
00054                         const char * theDesc,
00055                         RooRealVar & dt) {
00056 //
00057 // Initialization
00058 //
00059     baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00060     setDependent(dt);
00061     initParameters();
00062 }
00063 
00064 void BdkPdf2Gauss::setDependent(RooRealVar & dt) {
00065 //
00066 // set dependent
00067 //
00068     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00069     _dt = &dt;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BdkPdf2Gauss::initParameters() {
00073 //
00074 // Initialize parameters 
00075 // The parameter variables are actually created here.
00076 //
00077     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00078     
00079     // now define the RooVars
00080     _f1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".f1",
00081                          "First Gaussian Fraction",
00082                          0.5,0.,1.);
00083     _b1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".b1",
00084                          "First Gaussian Bias",
00085                          0.);
00086     _s1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".s1",
00087                          "First Gaussian Scale Factor",
00088                          1.);
00089     _b2 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".b2",
00090                          "Second Gaussian Bias",
00091                          0.);
00092     _s2 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".s2",
00093                          "Second Gaussian Scale Factor",
00094                          2.);
00095   
00096     // set reasonable errors as first steps
00097     _f1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00098     _b1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00099     _s1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00100     _b2->setConstant(kFALSE);
00101     _s2->setConstant(kFALSE);
00102 
00103     _f1->setError(0.05);
00104     _b1->setError(0.05);
00105     _s1->setError(0.05);
00106     _b2->setError(0.05);
00107     _s2->setError(0.05);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void BdkPdf2Gauss::createPdf() {
00111 //
00112 // Build the pdf.
00113 //    
00114     
00115     _g1 = new RooGaussian(TString(GetName())+".g1","First Gaussian", 
00116                          *_dt, *_b1, *_s1);
00117     _g2 = new RooGaussian(TString(GetName())+".g2","Second Gaussian", 
00118                          *_dt, *_b2, *_s2);
00119 
00120     _thePdf = new RooAddModel(TString(GetName())+".Pdf",
00121                               TString(GetTitle())+" Pdf",
00122                               RooArgList(*_g1,*_g2),
00123                               RooArgList(*_f1));
00124     
00125     setIsValid(kTRUE);
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 
00130 void BdkPdf2Gauss::linkResolution(const BdkPdf2Gauss & pdf2) {
00131 //
00132 // Link all resolution parameters of the two pdfs.
00133 //
00134     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00135     linkResolution(pdf2._f1 ,
00136                    pdf2._b1 , pdf2._s1,
00137                    pdf2._b2 , pdf2._s2);
00138 }
00139 
00140 void BdkPdf2Gauss::linkResolution(RooRealVar *f1,
00141                                   RooRealVar *b1,  RooRealVar *s1,
00142                                   RooRealVar *b2,  RooRealVar *s2) {
00143 //
00144 // Link the resolution parameters which are not set to 0.
00145 //
00146     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00147     if ( f1 != 0 ) {_f1 = f1;}
00148     if ( b1 != 0 ) {_b1 = b1;}
00149     if ( s1 != 0 ) {_s1 = s1;}
00150     if ( b2 != 0 ) {_b2 = b2;}
00151     if ( s2 != 0 ) {_s2 = s2;}
00152 }
00153 
00154 RooArgSet BdkPdf2Gauss::dependents() {
00155 //
00156 // Get dependent.
00157 //    
00158     return RooArgSet(*_dt);
00159 }
